definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: In both queries, the join predicate is expressed within the square brackets.
sentences.chinese: 在這兩個查詢中，方括號中表示了連接謂詞。

sentences.english: In syntax , items inside square brackets are optional.
sentences.chinese: 在語法中，方括號中的項是可選項。

sentences.english: This query uses square brackets, so what's wrong with it?
sentences.chinese: 這個查詢使用了方括號，那麼它錯在哪裏呢？

sentences.english: The first definition has no arguments, hence the empty square brackets.
sentences.chinese: 第一個定義沒有參數，因此方括號是空的。

sentences.english: How do I overload the square-bracket operator in C#?
sentences.chinese: 在C#，如何重載方括號運算符？

sentences.english: Square brackets denote a numerically indexed array.
sentences.chinese: 方括號表示數字索引數組。

sentences.english: The square brackets group the element logically.
sentences.chinese: 方括號將元素在邏輯上分組。

sentences.english: First, we create a binding using the square brackets.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我們使用一些方括號來創建一個綁定。

sentences.english: The last data type is the list, which is denoted by square brackets.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個數據類型是列表，列表用方括號表示。

sentences.english: Typing square bracket caret zero dash nine will exclude all numbers from matching.
sentences.chinese: 輸入方括號插入零九個破折號將排除所有號碼匹配。
